# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it by emailing the maintainers at [maintainer-email@example.com]. 

Please include the following information in your report:
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce the vulnerability
- Potential impact of the vulnerability
- Any possible mitigations you've identified

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and strive to provide a fix within 30 days.

## Supported Versions

Only the latest version of this project is supported with security updates.

## Security-Related Configuration

This project follows these security practices:
- Dependencies are regularly updated using Dependabot
- All GitHub Actions are pinned to specific versions
- Least-privilege permissions are used for all workflows
